title: Office and Archive
intro: You are in a dim office with a locked side door and a dusty bookshelf.

objects.name: side door
objects.inspect_text: A metal door with a simple keycode lock. It leads to another part of the office.

lock.on_success_text: The side door unlocks and swings open, revealing more of the office.
lock.on_failure_text: The metal lock stays firmly shut.

objects.name: dusty bookshelf
objects.inspect_text: Most of the books are useless, but one spine is worn. Inside you find: 'The side door code is 1000 + 234.'

objects.name: old desk
objects.inspect_text: In the desk drawer you find a scrap of paper: 'Final code = 7 * 11.'

objects.name: small safe
objects.inspect_text: A small combination safe requiring a two-digit code.

lock.on_success_text: The safe opens. Inside is a note with a key attached: 'You are free to go.'
lock.on_failure_text: The dial does not move. Wrong code.
